Package it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlienDiscardFrame
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Frame initialized when user has to discard a card in game, in the Alien Player version.
    BoxHandler
    Class that manages the clicks on the map image to select the single hexagon of the map that has been pressed.
    ButtonHandler
    Class that manages all the Button Listeners of the main game Frame
    CardHandler
    Class that manages all the MouseListeners on the card Images of different frames
    ClickableBox
    Class the keep track of the pixel position of any center of the map and offer some graphical functionalities such as the conversion to game coordinates of a click or the coloring of only determinate parts of the image
    DefinitiveAlienTurnFrame
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Main game Frame, in the Human Player version
    DefinitiveHumanTurnFrame
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Main game Frame, in the Human Player version
    DiscardFrame
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Frame initialized when user has to discard a card in game.
    FinalResultFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame with the final results of the game
    HumanDiscardFrame
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Frame initialized when user has to discard a card in game, in the Human Player version.
    Information
    Utility class that stores all the model information needed by the View in the various phases of the game
    LightsFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame with the Sector selection in the LightsCard use
    LightsHandler
    Class that manages the clicks on the map image to select the single hexagon of the map that has been pressed, in the LightsCard sector selection.
    RegistrationFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame with the name insertion box
    SwingView
    Class that manages and control the Graphical User Interface Creates and control the various game frames and analyze and manage the user inputs in response to the different game calls
    TextView
    Class that manages and control the Text User Interface Creates different text lines to describe the game flow and analyze and manage the user inputs in response to the different game calls
    ToolTipCard
    Class that manages the pop up tool tips that appear when user stops the mouse on an item card image in various GUI frames
    TurnFrame
    Class that manages the creation and usage of the Main game Frame
    View
    Abstract class the represent the User Interface, according to the "MVC" pattern
    ViewFactory
    Return to the caller a single instance of swing or text view, deploying the "factory" and "singleton" patterns
    WaitFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame that signals it's not user's turn
    YouAreAlienFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame that shows to user that controls an Alien player,
    YouAreFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame that shows if user control an Alien or a Human player,
    YouAreHumanFrame
    Class that manages the initialization and display of the Frame that shows to user that controls a Human player,
